fields.text: Thank you for calling Tetra, the San Francisco-based AI assistant that captures and organizes your call notes so your team stays in sync.
For sales and partnership inquiries, please press [INDEX].
To schedule a product demo, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our demo scheduling team.
One moment please, connecting you to our partnerships team.
For support or billing questions, press [INDEX].
For technical support and troubleshooting, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.
For billing and account management, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account services.
